title: New: Heems – Computers
content:
With Das Racist’s rather underwhelming debut ‘please pay for this’ LP now out on shop shelves, Heems from the Brooklyn based rap group has dropped another tune from his anticipated debut solo EP. The EP, entitled Nehru Jackets, is due for release on January 1 2012.  If you’ve been following the exploits of Heems’ solo career then you’ve no doubt heard the majority of the EP. According to the man himself, it will contain the tracks ‘Womyn aka Hitch’, ‘Swate’, ‘NYC Cops’ and the paranoid little jam streaming below. All of which have been streaming, at least in some form, on the Internet for a while now.

Stream the new track below.
author: 5e9b68b27a1236eccfeb1d24
